title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Bicycling
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Bicycling                Bicycling        Miners Beach Road NPS photo   Â   Bicycles are permitted on the visitor use roads when traveling with the flow of traffic.  Bicycles, including mountain bikes, are not permitted on trails within Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.  The Hiawatha National Forest and Grand Island National Recreation Area offer many opportunties for trail biking. Please contact the U.S. Forest Service for more information.
